alert.note: Alert for Delta; Dickinson; Iron; Menominee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 15 at 9:41AM EST until December 15 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST /9 PM CST/ THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM EST /9 PM CST/ THIS EVENING TO 1 PM EST /NOON CST/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. For the High Wind Warning tonight, southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Iron, Dickinson, Menominee and Delta Counties. * WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 10 PM EST /9 PM CST/ this evening. For the High Wind Warning, from 10 PM EST /9 PM CST/ this evening to 1 PM EST /noon CST/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions into this evening due to low visibility. Damaging winds late tonight will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: If driving today, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. In preparation for the high wind event tonight, secure loose objects, including holiday decorations, or bring them into a safe location prior to the onset of winds. People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
